title: Temple of Amphiaraus
description: The Temple of Amphiaraus is an oracular temple dedicated to the hero/god Amphiaraus, located within the sanctuary of the Amphiareion. The site was believed to have healing powers and was particularly important in the Late Classical and Hellenistic periods (fifth to third centuries BCE).

properties.description: Representative location of Temple of Amphiaraus derived from Google Earth satellite imagery.
properties.title: Imagery location of Temple of Amphiaraus
